channel.title: Question about looping
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Question about looping" - Do super rare loop? even if i have 2 of them?

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: ok then thanks Ren Po Ken for letting me know

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded:
I wasn't denying your statement Runic, I was merely adding a comment. I never said anything about trading.

HaRaM08 - Counterfeit Passport: +1 Genjutsu Range, Ignores Pass Permits (Village Upgrade), 25 000 Ryo, Requires Pass Permits to Buy

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: @Ruinic, BvS-Uzuki and Ren Po Ken: which item do you mean when you say pass because i am very close to looping and im really confussed about the pass you guys are talking about or is it the substitute soul reaper badge

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: @Ren Po Ken: All store-bought items are tradeable, except the pass thingie.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: Ren Po Ken: Wouldn't that mean you could buy duplicates of all the perms in the shop and storehouse them in order to get duplicates? I was originally reading it like Ruinic was in that certain items, no matter how many you have, can't be store housed.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: I think that this is the blanket reason why store-bought permanents don't loop. Chakra Armor would have to be sized to your body, Fake Passes (as mentioned above) would have your picture on them, Ninja Dogs are highly trained and would only recognize one owner, etc.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: Personalised seems to refer to only the fake pass thingie, because a real pass would have your name and picture on it. So, logically, passes wouldn't be tradeable.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded:
personalized? The only way that can be is if you have only 1 item of that type and this includes monster drops and super rares. that's how I understand it anyway.

or maybe stuff like… Sword of the reaper?

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: Related question: "*Some items are personalized, and cannot be transferred." What items are personalized?

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: Great, I can keep my stockpile of a gillion smoke bombs.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded:
What McMasters said was that any freely tradeable items will now loop, and no permanent item is freely tradeable as you have to keep one in your inventory.

That said, it doesn't look like he removed any item's loopability, so that's all good.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: the new stuff that loops are kunai and smoke bombs :) not much help there :)

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded:
Thark: look again at what does loop. It wasn't changed so that all the items you can purchase from the store loop, it was only changed for items that are frequently simply dumped unceremouniously into the village storehouse as one was about to loop, and pulled out again afterwards.

You can still do that with the perm items from the store, but only if you go out and buy extra, since the first of each can't be deposited.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded:
this is wierd. i though McMaster just changed so that al those bought items loop?

or did i get this news messege wrong? what items was he refering to then?

Thark

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: Ok here is the snapshot.First i put two but they repeat :) It's all in there! hope this helps you guys!

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: it definetely takes 0 stamina and it did not say anything about having a special mission in progress so I guess it's true it's exactly like the puzzles. processing images on flickr now…

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: Put image somewhere, www.flickr.com or something and later put link or insert image by 'insert image' icon.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded:
It might be best to host them on a site such as photobucket, and link to them from here.

Also, when you went back to the Main and later returned to the Special Missions page, did it say you had a Special Mission in progress? If not, then this is probably done in the same fashion as the puzzles are done, and doesn't take any stamina to reach that page.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: I looped! now please tell me how can I put here the 2 images(printscreens) ? anyway people you should know this. You can begin the special mission at any time and come back to the main without any problem (don't know if you can do another special mission cause i haven't tried that-didn't have any-, but i'm pretty sure you can)

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: I'll post here after loop with the screen shot

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: I can't say from experience, but I'm sure you'll be fine. If you pick up the special mission for looping, it should tell you what will loop…and really, I don't see why if one would loop, a second wouldn't.

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: ok I will do that but please tell me if is safe to loop with 2 codecs!

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded:
When you loop could you make screenshot of items that are now loopping and not looping?

And then type in here or insert image for us to see?

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: the post that is just above this one is mine :) forgot to login

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded:
I see oh great Yoda! but me young padduwan has seen the guide(for about, I dunno, 6524 times) but it does not say if multiple items of the same type (2 codecs) loop.

So still waiting for an answer :)

"Any Super-Rare from the Prize Wheel" loop I got that part ;)

item.title: Re: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: Young Skywalker the answers you seek lay within!

item.title: Question about looping
item.content:encoded: I have 2 codecs. and i'll loop today. What to do? should i take both of them with me? Will i lose one ? And another question do I need 30 stamina for Into the Loop mission? or is it free?
